user.title: Microsoft Global Secure Access Version
user.description: Do you want to set up the Microsoft Global Secure Access Version sensor? This integration requires no configuration.

scraping_failure.title: Persistent Scraping Failure in Global Secure Access
scraping_failure.description: The integration has been unable to fetch the latest version information for over 24 hours. This usually means the Microsoft Learn website has changed its layout. Please open an issue on GitHub and provide your logs.
